ygData.subject: Re: Screaming Mace Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The two molds are not directly related to the screaming mace quest, but are obtained from the same NPC s that you deal with for the screaming mace, and
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Cillo, Christopher L." <CLCILLO@...>
>I do not think they are part of the mace quest. All you need to get >the
>mace is a Crush tunic from Crush and a battle bracer from the warlord. The
>molds might be to another quest.
>
>Chris aka Thunderheart
>Level 21
>Wood-Elf
>Druid
>Innoruuk server
>---=== Divine Wind ===---

The two molds are not directly related to the screaming mace quest, but are
obtained from the same NPC's that you deal with for the screaming mace, and
therefore usually get grouped with that quest. I'm still looking for
information as to what these 2 molds are used for (blade mold and sledge
mold) in blacksmithing, and what the proper mixtures of the materials are
needed for a successful combination.
